Tucson had a feeling that Leo wouldnt allow him to go it alone but as Leo a=
nd the others were catching up to him, he takes things in stride and slows =
his sprint down to a lope and then to a trot before slowing further to a wa=
lk and then stops.  Something stops him from making a foolish mistake.  Ins=
tead he transforms into robot mode and nods to his comrades.

" Intuition j=
ust told me to take a different approach to this situation.  Something that=
 only Master Yoketron would do at a time like this.  I must remember my tra=
ining, and why I was chosen to undergo such mentor ship ."

He looks to Leo=
 and Big Convoy.  

" All right, we still have a bit of a way to go by the =
sound of things, and I think a two phased strategy is better than a one sho=
t deal.  Since I've been blind for a long time, I can navigate in darkness =
rather quickly.  It's best you allow me to go ahead and map a way for you t=
o allow easier access and cut down on time expansion.  Leo, Big Convoy, I w=
ould like the heavier Maximals to follow behind with you, and the Maximals =
who are swift and agility based to follow me.  You can chose whoever you de=
em fits either category.  This also holds true for the Predicons assisting =
in our efforts.  We have a greater chance at success if we work strategical=
ly."

Don't be envious of what you don't have, be grateful for things you a=
lready posses.  Nothing is worth more than family and friends.

On Jan 16, =
2012, at 6:41 PM, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

> > <OLD=
>

k raise of his

=
> >

R YOU!"
> >
> > He turns to Leo.
> >
> > " I appreciate your efforts, Leo b=
ut rescuing Optimus is something I must do
> > alone. I sense his pain and =
anguish, and I can not allow it to continue. I
> > MUST SAVE HIM NO MATTER =
WHAT HAPPENS TO ME. The old dragon lived up to his
> > promises and to hono=
r his gift of spirit he has given to me I must do the
> > same if I'm to ho=
nor him justly. I owe him the same as he has given me. A
> > chance at life=
, and a chance of freedom."
> >
> > He turns around and at a steady lope, h=
e follows Prime's voice.
> >
> > " Leo, NEVER RUN FROM WHAT YOU BELIEVE IN!=
 AND DON'T LET ANYONE TELL YOU
> > THAT YOU CANNOT DO WHAT IS IN THE BEST I=
NTEREST OF THIS PLANET AND EVERYONE
> > WHO LIVES HERE! SHOW MAGMATRON WHAT=
 YOU'RE MADE OF! AND SHOW HIM THAT NO
> > MATTER HOW MISERABLE HE TRIES TO =
MAKE IT, NO WAY IN THE NAME OF PRIMUS WILL
> > HE GET WHAT HE WANTS! YOU CA=
N DO IT LEO PRIME! YOU CAN DO IT!". I KNOW YOU
> > CAN!"
> >
> > With his s=
trong words of encouragement, Tucson goes from a lope to a full
> > draconi=
c sprint .
> 
> LEO PRIME looked at TUSCON as he moved swiftly down the hal=
l. He
> turned to BIG CONVOY as he walked up.
> 
> "Was I ever that full of=
 myself?" LEO said.
> 
> BIG CONVOY chuckled, "That and then some. I can re=
member the story
> that Lio convoy told me, and I was around for some of it=
 myself."
> 
> LEO nodded, "Let's go before he get's his aft blown off."
> =

> BIG CONVOY nodded as he, LEO, WINGCALIBER, and SANTON all assumed
> beas=
tmode and began running down the tunnel as well.
> 
> Meanwhile CRYOTEK jus=
t shook his head, "Let's see what they're up to."
> 
> SKYSHADOW glanced ba=
ck at CRYOTEK, "Of what value is this to us this
> is a Maximal fight now?"=
 His face was calm yet there was a crafty
> light in it.
> 
> "If that is t=
ruly Optimus Prime, then I want him dead." CRYOTEK said,
> "And if it's not=
, then I want to be down there to take advantage of
> whatever the situatio=
n is."

tuition just told me to take a different approach to this situation.  =

ust remember my training, and why I was chosen to undergo such mentor ship =

nd of things, and I think a two phased strategy is better than a one shot d=

r you to allow easier access and cut down on time expansion.  Leo, Big=

he Maximals who are swift and agility based to follow me.  You can cho=

LEO P=
RIME looked at TUSCON as he moved swiftly down the hall. He<br>
turned to B=
IG CONVOY as he walked up.<br>

r>
